1.description: First, create the blade, which will serve as the primary functional element of the object, providing the sharp edge necessary for cutting or slicing. This blade will be positioned at the forefront of the assembly, establishing the main profile and purpose of the object while setting the stage for the subsequent components that will enhance its usability and design.

2.description: Finally, attach the handle to the base of the blade, ensuring it is securely fastened to provide a comfortable grip for the user while maintaining a balanced weight distribution. This addition is essential as it not only enhances the usability of the knife but also reinforces the structural integrity between the blade and the handle, completing the overall design of the knife.
